body:
Spack rewrites yaml files when using commands such as
```sh
spack --env-dir utils/spack/redshift compiler find view-compilers
```

Every time Spack runs, it adds another empty line in front of comments. (I thought there was an open issue about this already, but now I cannot find it.)

As a quick fix, could you delete all empty lines in the resulting file? This way, at least Spack is idempotent.
title: Spack adds empty lines when it rewrites yaml files
